name: express-typescript-starter
description: A starting point for Node.js express apps with TypeScript
author: Bowden Kelly

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve"
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
